page.title: 01SUMMARY WINTERBOURNE VALLEY
page.content: This is a rural area including part of a winterbourne (winter river) valley and part of the village of Winterbourne Steepleton, with chalk downland rising behind. The population is low and there are very few amenities. The area is within 10 miles of Dorchester, Bridport and Weymouth with access by road :- private and public transport. The farming is mixed with corn and animals. Very detailed farming survey is included. This is an area of outstanding natural beauty with scenic views.
